data.title: Mike Simpson, Basketball Player
data.meta_description: Mike Simpson stats and bio. Stats averages season by season. Quick access to game by game stats.
data.text:
Mike Simpson - Points

Mike Simpson scores a career high 12 points (2015)

On January 25, 2015, Mike Simpson set his career high in points in a NCAA game. That day he scored 12 points in Rowan Profs's road loss against Princeton Tigers, 96-48. He also had 3 rebounds, 2 assists, 1 steal. He shot 4/8 from two, 1/4 from three, shooting at 41.7% from the field. He also shot 1/2 from the free-throw line.

Mike Simpson - Rebounds

Mike Simpson grabs a career high 3 rebounds (2015)

On January 25, 2015, Mike Simpson set his career high in rebounds in a NCAA game. That day he grabbed 3 rebounds in Rowan Profs's road loss against Princeton Tigers, 96-48. He also had 12 points, 2 assists, 1 steal.

Mike Simpson - Assists

Mike Simpson gives a career high 2 assists (2015)

On January 25, 2015, Mike Simpson set his career high in assists in a NCAA game. That day he dished 2 assists in Rowan Profs's road loss against Princeton Tigers, 96-48. He also had 12 points, 3 rebounds, 1 steal.

Mike Simpson - Steals

Mike Simpson has a career high 1 steal (2010)

On November 16, 2010, Mike Simpson tied his career high in steals in a NCAA game. That day he reached 1 steal in Coppin State Eagles's road loss against Towson Tigers, 89-74. He also had 1 rebound.

Mike Simpson - Efficiency

Mike Simpson records a career high 8 efficiency rating (2015)

On January 25, 2015, Mike Simpson set his career high in efficiency in a NCAA game. That day he accomplished 8 efficiency in Rowan Profs's road loss against Princeton Tigers, 96-48. He also had 12 points, 3 rebounds and 2 assists.
